Subject: Hamcrest Type mismatch

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I have been playing with Hamcrest a little and I keep running across a
problem with generic type being mismatched in assertThat().

Example:

 Object actual = "a string";
 assertThat(actual, is("a string"));

The compiler says:

<T>assertThat(T, Matcher<T>) cannot be applied to (Object, Matcher<String>)

I can work around it by casting the expected value to object, or the actual
value to String...

 assertThat(actual, is((object) "a string"));

Am I doing something wrong? Is there a better approach? A better workaround?
Should I just suck it up?

Another list where I should be asking questions about Hamcrest?

-- 
Kevin
